member.name: T:DoubleToIEEE754.DoubleExtension
member.summary: This is an extension class for System.Double which provides converting methods to IEEE 754 standard.

member.name: M:DoubleToIEEE754.DoubleExtension.ToIEEE754UsingBitConverter(System.Double)
member.summary: This method convert double into string which represents it in IEEE 754 using BitConverter.
member.param: Double number which must be converted
member.returns: String representation of double in IEEE 754

member.name: M:DoubleToIEEE754.DoubleExtension.ToIEEE754(System.Double)
member.summary: This method convert double into string which represents it in IEEE 754.
member.param: Double number which must be converted
member.returns: String representation of double in IEEE 754
